self.name: messages.setGameScore
self.description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game sent as a normal message (bots only).
self.descriptionExcerpt: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game sent as a normal message (bots...

arguments.name: editMessage
arguments.description: Set this flag if the game message should be automatically edited to include the current scoreboard

arguments.name: force
arguments.description: Set this flag if the high score is allowed to decrease. This can be useful when fixing mistakes or banning cheaters

throws.description: The provided message id is invalid
throws.name: MESSAGE_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: This method can only be called by a bot
throws.name: USER_BOT_REQUIRED
